QuestData.Title: The Binding
QuestData.Description: A noise in the main chamber of the temple draws your attention. You hear a familiar laugh... Lorthuna. She's returned to interrupt the ritual - you must stop her!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Leader of the remaining Twilight's Hammer in Deepholm.
QuestData.RewardText: Maruut said when all dis started dat he would gladly give his life ta see our task done. He would be proud of dis success... of dis death.$B$BDa rift be closed on dis side. Deepholm should calm down a bit. It'll be takin' time for Thrall to mend da wound in Azeroth, and we'll be needin' to remain until he finishes.$B$BThank you for all ya've done. I don't tink we could have been accomplishin' dis so soon without you.
